WELCOME TO SEEDWATER CONSULTING

Strengthening commmunities through locally-driven projects, training, and grants.

Seedwater Consulting is a mission-driven, human rights focused, development consulting firm with expertise in agriculture, policy, economic development, and public health. With experience in East and Southern Africa, Central America, Europe, and North America, we work to empower local communties to develop their capacity and deliver fundamental human rights in a self-directed and sustainable fashion.

For more about our approach, please click here. To learn about our expertise and our team, please click here.
